new VElement(
    'div', 
    {'id': 'container'},
    [
        new VElement(
            'h1', 
            {style: 'font-size: 28px;color: blue'}, 
            ['simple virtal dom- h1']
        )
        ,
        new VElement(
            'p', 
            ['Hello, p1111111111111']
        )
    ]
)

点击按钮后: 

new VElement(
    'div', 
    {'id': 'container'}, 
    [
        new VElement(
            'i', 
            {style: 'font-size: 14px;color: red'}, 
            ['simple virtal dom- h2']
        )
            ,
        new VElement(
            'p', 
            ['Hello, p2222222222']
        )
    ]
)
